game.name: PAYDAY 2: Cartel Optics Mod Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Mexican cartels have access to the very best weapons technology that money can buy. As the Payday Gang travels to Mexico, they can pick up a range of advanced mods. The Cartel Optics Mod Pack DLC includes 10 new weapon mods, with a focus on optics and sights.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Mexican cartels have access to the very best weapons technology that money can buy. As the Payday Gang travels to Mexico, they can pick up a range of advanced mods. The Cartel Optics Mod Pack DLC includes 10 new weapon mods, with a focus on optics and sights.
